articles.title: "Another storm coming": WHO warns of omicron surge in Europe - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Within weeks, omicron will dominate in more countries of the region, pushing already stretched health systems further to the brink.
articles.content: The World Health Organization's top official in Europe urged governments on Tuesday to prepare for a significant surge in coronavirus cases across the continent due to the omicron variant, which is a… [+1712 chars]
